devdoc.author: Yan Man

params._newThreshold: new threshold value to change to

chargeBattery(uint256,uint256).return: new amount of charge currently filled

decommissionBattery(uint256).return: number of batteries after batt has been decommissioned

getRelevantBatteryInfo(uint256).return: battery characteristics as list of values

isAdmin(address).return: whether address is an admin user

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A Virtual Power Plant implementation. Consensys Final Project Winter 2018/19

addBattery(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes.notice: add battery to array of storage assets

changeBatteryThreshold(uint256,uint256).notice: alter battery threshold that determines charge/discharge decision

decommissionBattery(uint256).notice: decommission battery, ie set active to false and move to other array

isAdmin(address).notice: allow other contracts to check admin users

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

toggleContractActive().notice: toggle stopped variable for circuit breaker design
